title: John de Rygater
text:
John de Rygater (also Rigater) was an <a href="England">English</a> medieval university <a href="Chancellor%20%28education%29">chancellor</a>.
Between 1239–40, John de Rygater was <a href="Chancellor%20of%20the%20University%20of%20Oxford">Chancellor</a> of <a href="Oxford%20University">Oxford University</a>.
